name: Nick Block Blitz
description:
art inspired by gameplay of NIck block blitz

Nick Block Blitz is a new thrilling experience in wich you must use different blocks with their own gimmicks to beat the level. With many different blocks, and creative challenges to use them, this adventure has much to offer.

But that's not all! There are minigames, a picture creator mode and an ost playback mode, so why not give Nick Block Blitz a try today, and maybe even spread the word.
